thread.title: Chiropractor turns Deflategate into slightly terrifying Halloween display
thread.title_full: Chiropractor turns Deflategate into slightly terrifying Halloween display

title: Chiropractor turns Deflategate into slightly terrifying Halloween display
text: Real Estate Chiropractor turns Deflategate into slightly terrifying Halloween display Roger Goodell would probably give him a hefty suspension for this kind of behavior. October 19, 2015 | 12:55 PM By 7News Boston WHDH-TV Dr. Matthew Cooper has taken Halloween to the next level. The Wayland-based chiropractor went all-out in decorating the outside of his office, sharing his very pro-Patriots thoughts on the ‘Deflategate’ scandal. The display depicts NFL commissioner Roger Goodell being burned at the stake in front of Patriots flags. It doesn’t hold back, but according to a WHDH report , passers-by love the decorations, and constantly stop to take photos. Cooper crafts some sort of grand display every year, but this time, he couldn’t resist the low-hanging fruit that was ‘Deflategate.’ A photo posted by Ronna (@nausetbeachpix) on Oct 18, 2015 at 5:33am PDT
